questiontext.text: A teacher is interested in the association (the relationship) between the number of hours that his students have studied (x) and their examination marks (y). He performs a regression analysis with these two variables. The slope of the regression line can be interpreted as …

generalfeedback.text:
it is only the slope, without the intercept. Therefore it is not true. If it was true it was the slope plus the intercept. The right answer is: the average increase / decrease of the grade if a student studies one extra hour.
